pullRequest.title: Add new DocumentTest (FINERACT-1218)
pullRequest.bodyText:
This depends on #1454 and needs (tests) #1456 and will fail until those are in.
see FINERACT-1218

nodes.bodyText: Probably would make sense to check that get doesn't return the deleted document?
Spelling mistake - should be retrieve not retreive
Clearly would be great not to have to create this file but to have it autogenerated. I should have some time this weekend so can try to see if I can find a way to get this to work...
Brilliant to see how many bugs writing a decent test uncovers! :-)
